name: Grassfires of Veldstar
description:
LORE

outrun the flames

INFO

this is good if you like games where you die a lot and restart really fast and get better each time

its really short like you could beat it in 5 minutes if you're good

so you dont have to worry about eternity

but if youre not so good at it well youre in luck because the gameplay could be limitless

the sounds are really cute!! i made a bunch of them with my voice

TIP

see the read me for controls + secrets

HISTORY

i made this in 2013.  i was only 1 inch tall
